DEMO_129_MSG_010: ̅Hmm... There appears to be no sign of the humans inside here. I must wonder... what's become of them?
DEMO_129_MSG_020:
́Well yer Majesty, judgin' by the condition o' the machines 'round here, they must've just recently abandoned the place.
ā
DEMO_129_MSG_030:
́Otherwise, they'd have been all rusted and busted up...
And check that out! That one over there looks brand spankin' new!
DEMO_129_MSG_040:
́Well now, I just can't help myself! I'm gonna go have
a look an' see what it's supposed to do!
DEMO_129_MSG_050: ̅Oh hoh hoh hoh... typical Ace. However, this machine has also piqued my interest.
DEMO_129_MSG_060:
̅I hate to ask for more of you, ȁ, but would you mind keeping an eye on Ace over by that machine?
ā
DEMO_129_MSG_070: ̅We'll continue searching the remaining areas of the building. I'm trusting you two will figure out that device, ȁ.
